Header.title: APWS
Header.paragraph: Autonomous plant watering system(APWS) that will modernize the act of taking care of household plants or gardens

About.paragraph: The problem the team is trying to address is that plants can just as easily die from over-enthusiasm as can from neglect. Some factors that kill plants are dust, over-watering, disease, cramping, shock, air quality, neglect, dormancy, light levels, or too much fertilizer. Many at-home plant owners do not know how to keep track of these issues and the health of their plants as time goes on. Some just believe that they do not have a “green thumb.” Others might have a busy schedule resulting in less allocated time tending to their plants. Most household watering systems are outdated systems that are controlled in some sort of panel box found in the garage. Leaving many users unaware of the functionality of their water systems. This is where a digital and modern system is required.

Services.name: Moisture Level
Services.text: Monitors the moisture level of the soil so it knows when to water the plant, and for you to monitor as well

Services.name: Humidity Level
Services.text: Monitors the humidity level of the air outside

Services.name: Temperature Level
Services.text: Monitors the temperature oustide for monitoring and making sure it is suitable for the plant

Services.name: Light Level
Services.text: Monitors the light the plant is recieving so YOU can know if it is recieving enough light

Services.name: Tank Water Level
Services.text: Monitors the water level of the water tank, and sends a notification when it is getting to low and needs tobe refilled

Services.name: Battery Level
Services.text: Monitors the BAttery level of your probe and hub, and lets you know when it may be time to replace them

Features.title: Self Watering
Features.text: Tank full of water that will water your plants when needed as needed

Features.title: Plant Sensors
Features.text: Probe with five different sensors so you can keep track of all your plant statistics

Features.title: Hub
Features.text: Have more than one Plant you want to monitor? No problem, all you need is another probe for the plant, but it can all be monitored via one hub in your houshold

Features.title: Monitoring
Features.text: All in one web-application for you to monitor all your plants, change settings, and even manually water your plants if you choose to
